BLOCK.QRY: update actia_audit_sch_trn t set t.str_audit_status=6 where t.num_audit_sch_no=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?

INSERT INTO ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_FINALIZE_TRN (NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,STR_AUDIT_FINALIZE_STATUS,STR_FINAL_ACTION,STR_REMARKS,STR_AUDIT_RPT_FILE_NAME,STR_SYS_AUD_RPT_FILE_NAME,STR_SENT_TO_DPGI,STR_SENT_TO_GOV,DT_SUBMISSION_DPGI_DATE,DT_SUBMISSION_GOV_DATE,STR_APPROVE_BY,DT_APPROVE_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO)(SELECT T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,T.STR_AUDIT_FINALIZE_STATUS,T.STR_FINAL_ACTION,T.STR_REMARKS,T.STR_AUDIT_RPT_FILE_NAME,T.STR_SYS_AUD_RPT_FILE_NAME,T.STR_SENT_TO_DPGI,T.STR_SENT_TO_GOV,T.DT_SUBMISSION_DPGI_DATE,T.DT_SUBMISSION_GOV_DATE,T.STR_APPROVE_BY,T.DT_APPROVE_DATE,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_FINALIZE_TRN A where A.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_FINALIZE_TRN T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

update ACTIA_AUDIT_FINALIZE_TRN t set t.STR_AUDIT_FINALIZE_STATUS=?,t.STR_FINAL_ACTION=?,t.STR_REMARKS=?,t.STR_AUDIT_RPT_FILE_NAME=?,t.STR_SYS_AUD_RPT_FILE_NAME=?,t.STR_SENT_TO_DPGI=?,t.STR_SENT_TO_GOV=?,t.DT_SUBMISSION_DPGI_DATE=?,t.DT_SUBMISSION_GOV_DATE=?,t.STR_APPROVE_BY=?,t.DT_APPROVE_DATE=?,t.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,t.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE actia_audit_parafinal_trn T SET T.STR_AUDIT_START_YEAR=?,T.STR_AUDIT_END_YEAR=?,T.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE=?,T.DT_SUBMISSION_MSO_DATE=?,T.DT_SUBMISSION_GOV_DATE=?,T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,T.STR_CONC_PERSON_NAME=?,T.STR_ACTION_TOBE_TAKEN=?,T.GSTR_REMARKS=?,T.STR_ACTION_STATUS=?,T.DT_FINAL_REP_SUB_DATE=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_PARAFINAL_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
